title: 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, in brick build. heat/hot water and 2 pkg included.
posting_body: ['Spacious 2 bedroom unit with breakfast bar and living room', 'with glass doors to a private patio.', '2 parking plus heat/hot water included.', 'Hardwood floors, 2 bathrooms ceiling fans, wall a/c and', 'walk in closet.', 'Walk 2 minutes to bus to Longwood Medical, Boston,', 'the Orange line, shops, restaurants, etc.', 'Available for September 1.', 'No pets or smoking.', 'Good credit and monthly income needed approx.', '$5,800.', 'Set up your viewing now.', 'Need notice to show.', 'There is a real estate fee of $2,500.', 'if you rent this condo.', 'Monaco R.E.', 'Newton, MA', '617-974-3019', 'Leave me your email address for photos.', 'Please reference: 2 Bedroom West Roxbury in your text or message Thank you']
